name: 6th Residential Energy Storage Forum
content: The 6th Residential Energy Storage Forum is held 31 March – 02 April 2020 in Munich, Germany. Join us to gain insights from 12 utilities/DSOs using residential energy storage. Features of the event include: • 40+ global speakers, 32 different researched topics, 2 panel discussions, 2 masterclasses, which will provide Solar Companies ample opportunities to get your problems solved • Hear from 3 Commercial & Industrial companies about battery technology, business models and more • Partake in a highly selective networking session and get a wider perspective with experts on residential energy storage • Learn from installers, regulators, and investors addressing the key researched topics from residential energy storage experts
